title: Andy’s Big News, Plus an Interview With the Creator of ‘Black Earth Rising’ | The Watch (Ep. 324)
description:
Andy tells us what it's like to have his show ‘Briarpatch’ picked up by USA Network (0:39). Plus: an interview with Hugo Blick, the creator of the Netflix show ‘Black Earth Rising,’ which is about the aftermath of the Rwandan genocide (32:22).
Host: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Hugo Blick
Read more about ‘Briarpatch’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
